summary: This bill, the La Paz County Solar Energy and Job Creation Act, directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey approximately 3,400 acres of federal land in Arizona to La Paz County. The conveyance is subject to existing rights and the exclusion of land with significant resources. The county must pay fair market value and cover conveyance costs. The bill mandates protection of tribal cultural artifacts and withdraws the land from mining and mineral leasing. Proceeds from the sale of land go to the Federal Land Disposal Account.
